sense.def:
Z izrazom
merely
poudarimo, da je nekaj samo takšno kot rečemo, in nič boljše, večje, pomembnejše ali privlačnejše.

seg.quote: This is not genuine. It's merely a reproduction.
We accept ideas like this merely because they have never been challenged.

sense.def:
Izraz
not merely
uporabimo pred manj pomembno od dveh izjav, da tako poudarimo pomembnejšo izjavo.

seg.quote: Much of this new industry was not merely in India; it was Indian-owned.
